mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(country_code, 'all') AS country_code, COUNT(*) AS total_users, COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = 1 THEN 1 END) AS man, COUNT(CASE WHEN gender = 2 THEN 1 END) AS woman FROM user GROUP BY country_code WITH ROLLUP;

SELECT CASE WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 0 AND 19 THEN 'age_0_19' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 'age_20_29' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 'age_30_39' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 'age_40_49' ELSE 'age_50_plus' END AS age_group, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user GROUP BY age_group;

SELECT country_code, CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 19 THEN 'age_0_19' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 'age_20_29' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 'age_30_39' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 'age_40_49' ELSE 'age_50_plus' END AS age_group, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user GROUP BY country_code, age_group;
